content:
content-type: text/plain
from: security@banksecure.com
subject: Password Reset Request
return-path: noreply@banksecure.com
body: We received a request to reset your password. Use the code 842931 to complete the reset. This code expires in 10 minutes.

content-type: text/plain
from: alerts@socialnet.com
subject: Verify Your Account Email
return-path: verify@socialnet.com
body: Please confirm your email address by clicking the link: https://socialnet.com/verify/ABC123. This link will expire in 24 hours.

content-type: text/plain
from: no-reply@shopnow.com
subject: Your Order #A7854 is Out for Delivery Today
return-path: alerts@shopnow.com
body: Good news! Your package is on the truck and will be delivered today between 2 PM–5 PM. Track it here: https://shopnow.com/track/A7854

content-type: text/plain
from: security@cloudstore.io
subject: Unusual Login Attempt Detected
return-path: alert@cloudstore.io
body: We detected a login to your account from a new device in Berlin at 03:12 AM UTC. If this was not you, secure your account immediately: https://cloudstore.io/security

content-type: text/plain
from: notifications@healthclinic.com
subject: Appointment Reminder – Dr. Lee at 10:30 AM Tomorrow
return-path: reminders@healthclinic.com
body: This is a reminder for your appointment with Dr. Lee tomorrow at 10:30 AM. Please arrive 10 minutes early.

content-type: text/plain
from: security@payfast.com
subject: Verify Payment Authorization
return-path: alerts@payfast.com
body: A payment of $1,250.00 is pending approval. Use code 574839 to authorize. This code expires in 5 minutes.

content-type: text/plain
from: no-reply@streamcast.com
subject: Your Live Stream Starts in 15 Minutes
return-path: alerts@streamcast.com
body: Your scheduled live stream "Morning Talk" will begin at 08:00 AM UTC. Click here to start: https://streamcast.com/start/5678

subject: Suspicious Activity Detected on Your Account

subject: Payment Due Today – $89.70

subject: Confirm New Device Login
